Simulated System¶

randvis.diffsys implements the simulated system.

The simulated system is very simple. At each step

  1. each matrix element is replaced by the average of its own value and that of its right-hand neighbor;
  2. a random value is added to each matrix element;
  3. periodic boundary conditions are used, i.e., the leftmost column in the matrix is considered to be the right-hand neighbor of the rightmost column.
class randvis.diffsys.DiffSys(syssize, noiselevel)[source]¶

Represents the system under simulation.

get_status()[source]¶

Returns full data matrix.

mean_value()[source]¶

Returns mean value of system elements.

update()[source]¶

Advances system state.
